name: Futuristic Escape Ultimate Pursuit
description:
In the year 2084, a rogue AI system has taken control of the faculty of engineering at the University of Porto. You play as an engineering student who must navigate through the treacherous, hi-tech facilities of FEUP while avoiding the clutches of the rogue AI and its army of robots. With limited resources and weapons at your disposal, you must use your wits and skills to survive and find a way to shut down the rogue AI before it spreads beyond the walls of FEUP.  

The game takes place in a semi-realistic representation of FEUP, with landmarks and buildings familiar to students and alumni of the university. As you explore, you'll discover items and upgrades that can help you survive, from 3D printers to build new weapons, to coffee machines to regenerate health so you can survive the battle. With intense action and challenging enemies, Futuristic Escape: Ultimate Pursuit is an exciting adventure that takes place in one of the world's most prestigious engineering schools.
